channel.title: Personal Note on Just A Data Geek
channel.description: Recent content in Personal Note on Just A Data Geek

item.title: Natural Gas and Some Other Stuff
item.description: It has been a while since I have posted anything on my blog. Life has been busy since I started a new job in mid-January. I accepted a position as a Risk Analyst with a company in the energy industry. I focus on the financial and economic risk faced by the company, including natural gas and electricity prices. The learning curve is steep, but I am enjoying it: I have reached Nerdvana!
